root.name: Project H.A.M.M.E.R.
root.description: OverviewProject H.A.M.M.E.R. was a Wii title announced at E3 2006 for the then-upcoming Wii console. Developed by Nintendo Software Technology Corporation, the game was an action title in which the player would control a character that fought by swinging a giant hammer. However, no further information on the game followed the announcement, and it has since been cancelled.
